title: Group portrait of eight men, including a camera man far left,  A. N. Brion, president of the Eastern Division of Greyhound Bus, third from left holding pick axe, Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence, fourth from left, holding shovel, and Pat Navarro, of the Navarro Corporation contracting firm, fifth from left, gathered in front of a Greyhound bus at the site of the new Greyhound Bus Station on the corner of 11th Street and Liberty Avenue in the Strip District
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
